com.bazaarvoice
Class Media

java.lang.Object
  com.bazaarvoice.Media
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class Media
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable

Contains byte data for a media object such as a photo or video; used internally for uploading media in a request.

Created on 7/9/12. Copyright (c) 2012 BazaarVoice. All rights reserved.

Author:
Bazaarvoice Engineering

Nested Class Summary
static class Media.MediaType
          An enum used for defining the type of media associated with an instance of Media.

Constructor Detail

Media

public Media(byte[] media,
             Media.MediaType type,
             java.lang.String filename)
Construct a media object

Parameters:
media - the media data
type - the type of object
filename - the filename of the object. This is important for determining the MIME type. Make sure you use the right extension for the data, ie .jpg .avi etc
